DOC.criteria: 1 . Male sex 2 . Age < 65 3 . IIEF erectile function domain score > 26 ( 30 point possible subscale ) 4 . Steady sexual partner 5 . Untreated prostate cancer TNM stage < cT2bNxMx ( cT1a , cT1b , cT1c , cT2a ) Gleason grade < 8 . 6 . Willingness participate clinical trial manifest informed consent 7 .
